products.name: Intel Core i9-14900K
products.description: The flagship unlocked desktop processor with 24 cores (8 P-cores, 16 E-cores) and 32 threads. Max turbo frequency up to 6.0 GHz. Ideal for extreme gaming and professional content creation. Requires a high-end cooling solution.

products.name: AMD Ryzen 7 7800X3D
products.description: A high-performance gaming CPU featuring **AMD 3D V-Cache Technology** for massive L3 cache (96MB). This processor offers the best gaming performance per dollar and is built on the modern AM5 platform.

products.name: Intel Core i5-13600K
products.description: A powerful mid-to-high-range CPU with an excellent balance of performance for both gaming and multitasking. Features 14 cores (6 P-cores, 8 E-cores) and is a superb value for most PC builds.

products.name: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
products.description: A budget-friendly 6-core processor that still delivers solid gaming performance on the reliable AM4 platform. Great for first-time builders and e-sports enthusiasts. Includes the Wraith Stealth cooler.

products.name: Intel Core i3-14100
products.description: An entry-level 4-core, 8-thread processor offering fast single-core performance suitable for office tasks, web browsing, and casual gaming. A reliable choice for simple, low-power systems.

products.name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090
products.description: The ultimate gaming GPU, built with the Ada Lovelace architecture. Experience unprecedented performance in 4K resolution, ultra-low latency, and enhanced ray tracing capabilities with DLSS 3.

products.name: AMD Radeon RX 7900 XT
products.description: A high-end GPU designed for 4K gaming with an emphasis on raw rasterization performance. Features the new AMD RDNA 3 architecture and 20GB of high-speed GDDR6 memory.

products.name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 Ti
products.description: The sweet spot for high-refresh-rate 1440p gaming and a solid entry point into 4K. Excellent power efficiency and full support for NVIDIA's AI and streaming technologies.

products.name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
products.description: The most popular GPU for 1080p gaming, providing a fantastic blend of performance and affordability. Still supports Ray Tracing and DLSS (DLSS 2).

products.name: AMD Radeon RX 6600
products.description: An entry-level graphics card offering great price-to-performance for budget 1080p gaming. Very power efficient and requires minimal power supply overhead.

products.name: Corsair Vengeance 32GB (2x16GB) DDR5-6000
products.description: High-speed, low-latency DDR5 memory kit optimized for the latest Intel and AMD platforms. Features a sleek, low-profile heat spreader for maximum compatibility with CPU coolers.

products.name: G.SKILL Ripjaws 64GB (2x32GB) DDR4-3600
products.description: A high-capacity, high-frequency DDR4 kit perfect for video editing, virtualization, and heavy multitasking on older-generation platforms. Excellent reliability and performance.

products.name: Crucial Pro 16GB (2x8GB) DDR5-5600 Laptop RAM
products.description: A reliable and powerful performance upgrade for modern laptops and Mini-PCs that utilize the SODIMM form factor. Simple plug-and-play installation.

products.name: TeamGroup T-Force Delta 32GB (2x16GB) DDR5-7200
products.description: Extreme performance memory for enthusiasts and overclockers seeking the highest possible speeds. Features vibrant **RGB lighting** for a striking visual effect in showcase builds.

products.name: Kingston Fury Impact 32GB (1x32GB) DDR4-3200
products.description: A single, high-density stick of SODIMM memory. Ideal for upgrading gaming laptops that have only one available memory slot, or for maximum capacity in a compact system.

products.name: Samsung 990 Pro 2TB NVMe SSD
products.description: A cutting-edge Gen4 M.2 SSD for blisteringly fast load times and file transfers. Perfect for gaming consoles and high-performance desktop PCs. Sequential read speeds up to 7,450 MB/s.

products.name: Western Digital Blue 4TB SATA HDD
products.description: A reliable, high-capacity mechanical hard drive for long-term data archival, video storage, and large game libraries where sheer speed is not the priority. Runs at 5400 RPM.

products.name: Crucial P3 Plus 1TB NVMe SSD
products.description: A great value Gen4 SSD that offers speeds significantly faster than SATA at a competitive price point. Ideal as a primary boot drive for a new PC build.

products.name: SanDisk Extreme Portable 1TB SSD (External)
products.description: A rugged, water-resistant external SSD for travelers and photographers. Provides fast transfer speeds via USB 3.2 Gen 2, offering excellent portability and protection for critical files.

products.name: Samsung 870 EVO 500GB SATA SSD
products.description: The best-selling SATA III SSD, perfect for breathing new life into older laptops and desktops. Offers rock-solid reliability and significantly faster boot times than a traditional hard drive.

products.name: Logitech MX Master 3S Wireless Mouse
products.description: The definitive mouse for productivity and creative professionals. Features ultra-fast MagSpeed scrolling, 8000 DPI tracking on glass, and customizable gesture buttons.

products.name: Corsair K100 RGB Mechanical Keyboard
products.description: A premium gaming keyboard featuring ultra-fast CORSAIR OPX optical-mechanical keyswitches and a durable aluminum frame. Includes dedicated media keys and a multi-function control wheel.

products.name: Dell UltraSharp 27-inch 4K Monitor
products.description: A professional-grade 4K monitor with exceptional color accuracy (99% sRGB, 95% DCI-P3). Perfect for graphic design, video editing, and detailed work. Features a USB-C hub with 90W Power Delivery.

products.name: SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro Wireless Headset
products.description: A premium multi-system gaming headset with simultaneous 2.4GHz and Bluetooth connectivity. Features hi-res audio drivers and an AI-powered noise-cancelling microphone.

products.name: Elgato Stream Deck
products.description: A customizable controller with 15 LCD keys that can launch actions, switch scenes, and control audio on the fly. Essential gear for streamers, podcasters, and productivity gurus.
